text: Earl Thomas Coleman (born May 29, 1943) is an American Republican politician and lawyer. He represented Missouri in the United States House of Representatives from 1976 until 1993. Coleman wrote an opinion piece in May 2019 saying that the Trump presidency was not legal and that Trump and Mike Pence should be impeached. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:Politicians from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Lawyers from Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Missouri General Assembly
title: Tom Coleman (Missouri politician)
